have you tried to change the resolution on the menu?
have you installed the restricted-modules package for that kernel?
make sure you have the linux-restricted-modules for the kernel you installed
go to Desktop > Admin > Synaptic, then search for restricted
edit /etc/X11/xorg.conf and add the resolutions you want at the end of the file
try cycling through them with the key combo: ctrl,alt,+ or -
i assume you restarted X after the changes you made
